biotools.summary: The Gene Array Analyzer (GAA) allow to process CEL files from GeneChip�� Gene 1.0 ST Arrays. Various processing steps and visualizations are implemented to identify alternative splicing events. Three simple steps have to be performed to submit a set of CEL files. After the processing is completed the results can be viewed in the browser.
